website_summaries.verdict: Dramatically extends the life of your manicure – even in women who wash their hands frequently. Some women bring it to the salon with them for their manicurist to use.
pros: A fusion of microscopic nylon fibers and ceramic powder dramatically increase the nail polish's lifespan
cons: Some customers noticed chips after just a few days

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it should last longer than 2 days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this top coat and a polish from Maxus. I followed the instructions to the letter. The polish and top coat lasted 2 days without a chip. I tried this 3 times and never made it past day 2 without chipping. I then used this top coat with another polish brand, same results. Then I wore this top coat on its own. Peeling and chipping at day 2. so I feel like it performs as I expect a drug store polish to perform. I like the polish well enough for $4-5, but not $18.
customer_reviews.author: Staci G

customer_reviews.title: Instantly dried my nail polish and gave it an extra shine that made them look like new. I usually do gel nail polish because ...
customer_reviews.text: This top coat its unbelievable! Instantly dried my nail polish and gave it an extra shine that made them look like new. I usually do gel nail polish because I have no patience to wait for them to dry and this products saves me the time and money of going to get gel manicure because it does it for me from the comfort of my own home and lasts without chips for weeks! Hight Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: LISDAY

customer_reviews.title: It works and lasts!
customer_reviews.text: Love this line. I had gels and gel color for a while. Wanted to give my nails a break and they were really brittle and breaking. This really helped and lasted much less ne’er then a normal nail polish.
customer_reviews.author: taylor whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Fast drying
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It’s a bit pricey, but it’s worth it! It definitely takes about 2-3 coats for dip nails and about 2 for gel. The product dries fast, which is why I like it. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Super long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Since all the nail salons have closed due to Covid, I had to say goodbye to gel manicures and was looking for ways to extend the life of my self-made manicures. This top coat really helped keep my polish stay on for a week, when normally it would chip within days.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best top coat I have ever used!! Provides an unbelievable glossy shine that lasts... AND it really does last at least a week without chipping!! I always use two coats after my color, then another coat later in the week. This is worth every penny and will now be the only top coat I use!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Not your everyday topcoat, truly spectacular!
customer_reviews.text: This top coat gives me freedom to do my nails at night and not wake up with sheet marks in my polish! Drys quickly and leaves a glassy shine that protects and lengthens the time between manicures. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: BEST top coat I’ve ever used and I’m a big ...
customer_reviews.text: BEST top coat I’ve ever used and I’m a big do it yourself kinda girl. Better than Out The Door and SecheVite, for sure. And nice shiny finish. Also, no nasties and all vegan!
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Does not protect manicure well.
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold polish well. I’ve found that a good top coat is everything. I had been using Nails. Inc, but since (at first) I liked their nail hardening base I got this too. Trying Smith & Cult now...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peels and flakes off in 12-18 hours
customer_reviews.text: This top coat peels off very quickly. Used it three times and in all three cases the polish peeled and pulled up around the edges within 12-18 hours after application. Will not use again. Instead I’ll have a nice pretty bottle on my shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Believer

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SHINY and quick drying
customer_reviews.text: This top goal gives THE PERFECT long lasting gel-like shine. Really impressed by it and would highly recommend. It's nice and thick, and is quick drying like the rest of the Maxus line. The polish + this top coat + the base resulted in a perfect long lasting pedicure for me that I haven't even had to touch up once. Really happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: kyle perez

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Hard as nails finish. Easily removed with regular remover.
customer_reviews.author: A. H. Clay

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: This top coat is amazing! It dries your manicure fast and with a super hard, shiny finish. I love the way it looks, but it is this product's durability that earns it the five-star rating. I can get 4-5 days out of a manicure without touching up.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Noring

customer_reviews.title: I would like to start by saying i love these products
customer_reviews.text: I would like to start by saying i love these products. I have always had trouble growing my nails, they would always break and they never looked healthy. I tried all types of products spent money at nail salons and never got the results I needed. I then found Maxus Nails. I read about their products and how their focus was on healthy nail care. I gave it a try and I am so excited about the results my nails are stronger. I haven't had breakages in the past few weeks and the colors are gorgeous!!! The top coat goes on smooth and gives your nails a glossy and fresh. salon look.
customer_reviews.author: Zohra Asghar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product. I rarely get professional manicures and I’m always looking for products that are safe for my nails. This top coat is perfect. My manicure lasts for at least a week! Highly recommmend it.
customer_reviews.author: Arina

customer_reviews.title: ... coat since it first came out and I absolutely love it! I've used so many different brands of ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this top coat since it first came out and I absolutely love it! I've used so many different brands of top coat, from Sally Hansen to Deborah Lippmann, and this is still my favorite. It dries quickly, has a nice shine, and really keeps the chips away. I'm hard on my hands, but I can still manage to go days without a chip (usually I chip by day 2-3). Buy it, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: ThePinkPanther

customer_reviews.title: Top Coat = EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Loved the top coat and that its made locally in the US! Within a few minutes my nails were completely dry and beautiful! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: This top coat is excellent! I’ve used it to maintain my manicure chip ...
customer_reviews.text: This top coat is excellent! I’ve used it to maintain my manicure chip free for over a week with only one additional application. When layering over my original manicure, it only added extra shine and protection to the color and was very easy and smooth to apply. This is a wonderful product and great staple to have! It’s certainly a must have for extending the life of your manicure and keeping your nails healthy and strong!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: It's just so so. I've had better for a lot less money. I won't buy again
customer_reviews.author: HappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Decent Shine Top Coat Nail Polish
customer_reviews.text: I get my nails done every other week and I take this with me for her to use on my nails. The shine does seem to be lasting longer than with other Top Coats & it does dry a little faster than the others. This bottle will last a long time for me, but will probably get it again when it finally does run out.
customer_reviews.author: KTD

customer_reviews.title: Very quick drying! Shiny!
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeee this topcoat. I take it to every nail salon I get a manicure at. Its very quick drying, has no smell, and makes your nails perfectly shiny. Did i mention its quick drying? Perfect for me, since I have no patience. Once I bought this one, I never bought any other.
customer_reviews.author: NFLY

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special. Doesnt work any better for me than my regular, go-to base coat. Nails chip after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worse I've tried yet!
customer_reviews.text: To pay what I paid for this item aggravates me. Never have I had a clear coat to peel off in only one day. I will stick with the cheap stuff from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B.

customer_reviews.title: Shiniest Top Coat in the Industry
customer_reviews.text: This top coat is a salon owner's dream. We exclusively use Maxus Nails Top Coat on our clients' manicures to seal the manicure, leaving a high shine finish that helps the manicure last 7 days, unchipped. This is a god send for my clients, and myself. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RBalciunas

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this polish it is sooooo beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this polish it is sooooo beautiful. The color is the perfect nude and with the combination with the base coat and the top coat it glides on perfectly and dries fast! I am terrible at doing my own nails and it was so easy and looks great! So happy with my purchase I highly suggest getting these products!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis S. Barbosa

customer_reviews.title: Worst nail product ever
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does not stay on your nails at all! It’s the worst product I have ever used. Do not waste your money. There are much much much better products in the market.

customer_reviews.title: it really really shines like advertisement says
customer_reviews.text: the shine is uniquely great, i mean really great and dries fast also, the non chip is real
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have top coat
customer_reviews.text: Fast drying, super high shine top coat. Makes my nails look great when used with color or even on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: A really awesome top coat
customer_reviews.text: A really awesome top coat. Lays on super smooth and dries in seconds. Most important for me, as someone who washes dishes daily, the top coat made the polish last way longer than usual, about 5 days, comparing to any other top coat I've tried. Try it and you will love it yourself!

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Fast drying, shiny and long lasting. No shrinking, gloopiness or toluene. Beats Seche Vite by a mile.

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: BUYER beware, during these times when everyone is washing their hands like crazy and sanitizing. THIS STUFF DOES NOT LAST, maybe it’s the sanitizer. My color is peeling after a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Makes any polish look like gels! i dont go to a salon without it. my nail girl already expects for me to pull out the base and the top! haha I heard they dilute formulas in some salons so I started bringing in my own base and top and have noticed a major difference in how long my manicure lasts.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: SUPER shiny finish and dried very quickly. I'm impressed with the quality of this product and would highly recommend it to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy over and over again
customer_reviews.text: I mostly do my own manicures and this product is fantastic! My color lasts longer. But also my nails look healthy. I know many who get gels and their natural nail is weak. I often bring my own color when I go to a salon, now I will bring my own base & top coat. This is better than any professional grade product I've used.

customer_reviews.title: No chips

customer_reviews.title: Top notch top coat!
customer_reviews.text: I love Maxus’ products. I bought this plus the base coat and adored color. The top coat is fast-drying, very light, but very strong. Even doing my nails myself (not very well, I’m no pro), I can get the manicures to last over a week! Usually I only last 3 days. Great products. Will definitely purchase again!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Top Coat!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. My nails are incredibly shiny and my manicures now last at least a week! Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: performs as promised
customer_reviews.text: After following the instructions, i have seen very good results.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This top coat is great!! My polish looks really shiny and my manicures last longer by at least a few days. I have a toddler so i am constantly washing my hands, dishes, giving baths and my manicures last through all that!! I bring it with me all the time now when i get manicures. I absolutely recommend this product and it is worth every penny!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Because I get no chip manicures, my nails have become weak and brittle. I was looking for a polish to strengthen my nails while looking like a professional had done them. This polish does just that! I love how it looks and more so how weightless it feels. My nails are shiny and firm! I definitely recommend this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Maxus top coat
customer_reviews.text: Love Maxus top coat! You can actually see the nylon in the polish, it’s incredible and keeps your nails lasting longer than a regular manicure!
customer_reviews.author: Kar

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and how fast it drys! It keeps my nails protected, but still chips somewhat easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel like it really making the nails stronger and keeping the ...
customer_reviews.text: I mentioned this in my other review of the "Inspired" product, and I used the top coat for that mani but the SHINE!!! It's really crazy how clear and shiny it is when it dries. I am going to be taking this with me to the salon every time now. I feel like it really making the nails stronger and keeping the mani longer.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: high shine , fast drying
customer_reviews.text: This top coat is amazing ! super fast drying, high shine and looks like if i got gel manicure.

customer_reviews.title: makes your nails super glossy and it's easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it claims. It extends the life of your manicure, protects nails from chips and keeps the color vibrant underneath, makes your nails super glossy and it's easy to apply. This gel like top coat really does look like gel, without the hassle! No more gel for me! Highly Recommended!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product......it dried my nails fast and left them shiny. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who doesn't have the time to wait for your nails to dry!

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best top coat ever!!! Keep getting it because it makes my polish last so long. The best!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! The topcoat polish is a perfect compliment to the MAXUS color polish! It went on very smooth, is incredibly shiny, and dries quickly! Best topcoat I've ever had!

customer_reviews.title: My Fave
customer_reviews.text: Sealed up the polish and kept in on and unchipped forever. There's so going back to any other polish for me.

customer_reviews.title: BEST Top Coat EVER!
customer_reviews.text: once you try this top coat there is no going back. Makes all my manis shiny and dries instantly. I always use it with the base coat and bring it with me to every mani and pedi appointment.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good top coat - dries quickly and it''s very smooth. Made my manicure look fabulous!

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product at a crazy price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This top coat is supposed to extend your polish and last without chips for several days according to the description. This is so not true as it has been only 2 days and two nails already have chips.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jones

customer_reviews.title: So glad to have stumbled upon this product
customer_reviews.text: Adds to the durability of the product, it also adds an incredible shine for the final touch! Make sure to buy it with the base coat and the desired color. So glad to have stumbled upon this product. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: adored nail polish and top coat and I LOVE the way my manicure looks
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased a bundle of the base, adored nail polish and top coat and I LOVE the way my manicure looks! The polish glides on smooth and stays for days! Definitely recommend and will be restocking with other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This top coat has by far exceeded my expectations! I did my nails 4 days ago and not only did the polish dry in just minutes and gave my nails a great shine, my nails also haven’t chipped yet, which usually happens within the first two days. Really love love love this top coat.
customer_reviews.author: Julz0518

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: The longevity,sheerness and thickness doesn’t matter if it’s a poor pr oduct. This base and top coat ,without a doubt the worst base cost and top coat ever! I have been a nail tech for 3 decades. I know how to use nail products . And I know how to prepare the nails before I polish. I purchased it according to the ratings . It did NOT dry fast at all, polish chipped off within a day. Needless to say the company would not take it back. It was so expensive . Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Carmella

customer_reviews.title: Expecting more
customer_reviews.text: For this price, I was expecting a lot more. Unfortunately, the very next day my nails were chipped and horrible. Off to search for another top coat. One that will do what it promises to do.
customer_reviews.author: bezonline

customer_reviews.title: Peels
customer_reviews.text: Very shiny but I noticed peeling on the tips of my nails the next day. Either the formula is off or it’s pretty old. Either way it’s not worth the twenty something I spent for it including shipping. I’d definitely recommend going to your local beauty supply and getting a bottle of “out the door” top coat instead. It’s not returnable so getting a refund for crap polish isn’t an option. Don’t spend your money on this polish!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This top coat is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This top coat is amazing!!! Really makes my manicure look flawless. Smooth, strong and just the right amount of shine!! It has lasted me forever and my nails have never been so strong and healthy. I use this in combination with their base coat, and these products have made all the difference for me. I could not be happier to have found this brand, I will definitely keep buying from them and recommend them to all my girlfriends! Definitely check out their base coat in combination of this to really get the full treatment
customer_reviews.author: Anaiz57

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Since it’s $18 which is outrageous to me I don’t use it for every manicure but if I am going on vacation I wear this and it’s worth it! I wore it to a HOT SPRINGS RESORT for three days and I still had perfect nails when I got home. Probably will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Rosko

customer_reviews.title: Great Top Coat!
customer_reviews.text: This top coat dries very fast. I apply it every 2 days and it keeps my manicure for almost 1 week which for me is a lot as my hands are always in water, etc. Very happy with this top coat.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Low quality top coat for the high price
customer_reviews.text: I really disappointed in this top coat. I have a few top coats and this one must be the worst! It started to crack in three days. My less expensive top coats hold a week or so. Moreover, it had no noticeable luster or shine after you apply it. And on the second day, it became semi-matte! Horrible overprice product! Will never buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: Great shine and lasts!
customer_reviews.text: I had read about Maxus in Vogue magazine and was eager to try it. I was super impressed with how quickly my nails dried and how the shine lasted for over two weeks. I also paired the top coat with the "Admired" color. My manicure lasted over well over 10 days with no chipping, peeling, or wearing on the edges. I carry the polish and top coat in my purse at all times in case I ever spontaneously get a manicure because I refuse to go back to normal salon polish that wears off in a matter of days. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Doesn't chip. Long lasting. The only draw back is that it gets thick too quickly. I am a repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Ducelick

customer_reviews.title: Dries fast and feels like gel.
customer_reviews.text: I love this top coat! It dries quick, thick and feels like a gel. It keeps my manicure from chipping for at least 6 days, usually longer. It's really hard to find quality long-wearing vegan nail things because they all chip, but this was worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: stargirl

customer_reviews.title: Shines.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this top coat. It seems a little thin when you first put it on, but it dries pretty quick and leaves a great shine. Love it. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mywhi

customer_reviews.title: great top coat, my nails didn't chip for almost a week
customer_reviews.text: this top coat is amazing. i haven't had time to go to a nail salon, so i used it at home and my nails looked professionally done - bright and shiny. the top coat also dries super fast which is important to me. i have three small kids and i wash my hands dozens of times a day. i was pleasantly surprised that the nail polish didn't chip for almost a week. i think the combination of the top coat and the maxus base coat was what helped, which is great for my busy lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon  Addict

customer_reviews.title: Shines up your nails without removing all you polish
customer_reviews.text: This works great on natural nails. If you use base, strengthener, and top coat you will see the investment is worth it. Top coat adds a super shiny finish to your nails and is light enough you can reapply rather than starting all over with base cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: The color stays on for 2-3 days before chipping and honestly for my crappy nails that is a miracle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the base coat, nude polish color, and the top coat. I only have used them together in the same line and I find it works well. The color stays on for 2-3 days before chipping and honestly for my crappy nails that is a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna M. Best

customer_reviews.title: Shine's like glass
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, not thick, dries fast, leaves nails with a great shine, I do recommend this product, and will buy it again

I'm used to the old formula of the Vinylux Top Coat lasting a week on me. So, it's a GOOD top coat, but not the best, for me anyway. It's a good alternative if you want something healthier!

customer_reviews.text: This top coat adds a gorgeous shine to any nail polish. I love it.

customer_reviews.text: So incredibly shiny and stays that way! I swear people think I have gel polish on whenever I use this product.

customer_reviews.title: This top coat is amazing! It's the only top coat that I've used ...

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love Maxus Nails Top Coat
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love Maxus Nails Top Coat! It made my manicure super shiny and extending the life on my mani with no chips. You will absolutely notice a difference!

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Should be in every salon.
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand so far! I bought the Base+Top+Adored. I usually get a no-chip manicure because a regular doesn't last more than 2 days. I'm on day 5 using all three products and my nails look fantastic. I have received so many compliments. People constantly ask me if I'm wearing a no-chip and are surprised when I say no. I talked up this brand to the owner of the salon I go to for my mani/pedi. I was hesitant to wear this color on my toes but the result was beautiful! My order arrived quicker than I expected and the seller was really helpful. Great products!!!
customer_reviews.author: Irene

product_meta.title: Maxus Nails Top Coat Nail Polish with High Shine, Quick-Drying, Clear.5 Oz.
feature_bullets: BEAUTIFUL LUSTER & SHINE: For a flawless manicure, use our protective top coat nail polish. This top coat application will make your nails shine, giving you unparalleled luster. After painting your nails, apply a bead of top coat to the cuticle area and gently drag it to the top of your nail. We recommend refreshing your manicure every 2 to 3 days for an extra boost of shine and longevity.

DRIES FAST: Waiting for your nails to dry is the worst! Fortunately, our top coat is super quick-drying, so you can get back to doing what you love. Plus, you’ll be able to do all your daily activities with gorgeously painted nails! This top coat will seal your original color, add shine, and give you a streak-free application.

LONG-LASTING: This innovative formula rivals a gel mani, offering long-lasting protection and shine to your manicure or pedicure. A ceramic powder seals the nail, which dramatically increases your manicure’s lifespan by keeping the paint safe from chipping. Then, a micro-mesh of high-tech nylon fibers strengthens your nail so that it won’t end up brittle, damaged, or broken.

SUSTAINABLE FORMULA: At Maxus Nails, we’re dedicated to giving you the best. That’s why our products are made in the USA for more superior quality. This top coat is no exception! It’s 10-free and vegan, as well as animal cruelty-free. You’ll be surprised by how effective this formula is. It will keep your manicure in pristine condition!

COMPLETELY SAFE: Don’t worry about ruining your nails when you use our top coat! It’s designed with your nail’s health in mind. This top coat polish by Maxus Nails is paraben-free, sulfate-free, phthalate-free, and gluten-free! It’ll provide durable protection while offering a gorgeous sheen and luster.
